https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/p0aJ42yUp5pS4MdPKP69VRZ2Gkp.jpg A panicked young woman and her two best friends fly to Mexico to delete a ranting email she sent to her new boyfriend. On arrival, they run into her former beau, who soon gets caught up in their frantic scheme. Desperados
